fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Stand guard outside a player’s house, shooting anyone that tries to visit them, and preventing anyone from successfully visiting them. (1 use)
-Shoot a player. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Anyone you attack will be attacked. If they don’t die, flee the scene and leave evidence, letting the person know who you are
-You will learn what level of attack anyone you attack has.
